textBeforeTable: 150%">Answer the questions listed below to determine if you need to conduct a self assessment. To answer these questions you should consider the last five times you engaged in the behavior described and then answer with your usual score. The word usual is here defined as about three of the last five times. 150%">One of the more important aspects of a self assessment is to evaluate ones progress over time on a semi-annual basis. This will keep you in check with regard to how well you really do play. In this scenario one only needs ten sessions every six months or so to keeps track of ones usual ability. Do you need to conduct a Self Assessment? 150%">When new tools have been selected, such as a low deflection pool stick, one can proceed a little more quickly if the instructions that come with the equipment are followed to allow a fair trial. 150%">Pre-post testing can also be used when you decide to take up a new way of shooting such as the use of backhand English.
